Rhythmyx 6 Public API

Package com.percussion.services.assembly.jexl

Class Summary
PSAssemblerUtils Various functions for use in the assembly engine
PSCodecUtils Various coders and decoders (codecs) for use in the bindings and velocity
PSCondUtils Functions for conditional value selection
PSDateUtils Date utilities, primarily for determining spans of time from a passed in date value.
PSDbUtils Functions to interface to the database
PSDocumentUtils Utilities to make document requests from a velocity macro
PSExtensionUtils Methods to be called from Jexl that will assemble and call an existing UDF extension.
PSExtensionWrapper Wrap an existing extension so it can be called from jexl.
PSGuidUtils Utility functions for use with guid data
PSI18nUtils Jexl functions that tie into the I18n utils
PSKeywordUtils Methods that enable the use of keywords when building assembly output.
PSLinkUtils Link manipulation utilities
PSLocationUtils Functions for use by jexl to calculate locations in assembly.
PSManagedNavUtils Utility methods to aid in managed navigation implementation.
PSPaginateUtils Jexl methods for paginating content items.
PSSessionUtils This is a collection of session utilities required for accessing the server through "front-door" requests.
PSStringUtils String utilities for Jexl bindings or Velocity macros
